mapper.insert: insert into checkouts (user_id,first_name,last_name,email,street_address, city, state, country, zip_code,credit_card_number,credit_card_cvv,credit_card_exp_year,credit_card_exp_month) values (#{userId},#{firstName},#{lastName},#{email},#{streetAddress},#{city},#{state},#{country},#{zipCode},#{creditCardNumber},#{creditCardCvv},#{creditCardExpirationYear},#{creditCardExpirationMonth})
